title.rendered: “IDF Retaliates Against Hezbollah: Strikes on Six Key Southern Lebanon Sites”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked targets of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in six areas in southern Lebanon, including a launch site from which anti-tank missiles were fired today towards Israeli territory.

Fighter jets attacked a military site of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in the area of Ayta al-Shaab, from where two anti-tank missiles were fired earlier today (Tuesday) towards Biranit area, no casualties.

In addition, the IDF attacked the organization’s operational command in the Jebel al-Butm area, launching positions in the Al Matmoura area, and military buildings in Majdal Zoun, Hula and Kafra areas.

Attached is documentation on the subject: https://bit.ly/3T2dSdF
